traits.name: Echolocation
traits.desc: The bat can’t use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The bat doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemies reach.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.desc: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 +2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Goblin Boomer (2/Day)
actions.desc: As a bonus action, the sky raider bat drops a ceramic pot of alchemist’s fire on a random target. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 2 (1d4) fire damage, and 2 (1d4) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.
